named-query.name: WorkflowProcess.readByCorrelationKey
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcess( info.processInstanceId,log.correlationKey,info.processId,workflow.model,info.startDate,log.end,log.duration,info.state ) FROM ProcessInstanceInfo info , ProcessInstanceLog log , Workflow workflow WHERE info.processInstanceId = log.processInstanceId AND info.processId = workflow.code AND log.processId = workflow.code AND log.correlationKey = :correlationKey

named-query.name: WorkflowProcess.readByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcess( info.processInstanceId,log.correlationKey,info.processId,workflow.model,info.startDate,log.end,log.duration,info.state ) FROM ProcessInstanceInfo info , ProcessInstanceLog log , Workflow workflow WHERE info.processInstanceId = log.processInstanceId AND info.processId = workflow.code AND log.processId = workflow.code AND info.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcess.readAll
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcess( info.processInstanceId,log.correlationKey,info.processId,workflow.model,info.startDate,log.end,log.duration,info.state ) FROM ProcessInstanceInfo info , ProcessInstanceLog log , Workflow workflow WHERE info.processInstanceId = log.processInstanceId AND info.processId = workflow.code AND log.processId = workflow.code

named-query.name: WorkflowProcess.countByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(info) FROM ProcessInstanceInfo info WHERE info.processId = :processId
